sentences.en: Ancient scrolls were found in caves by the Dead Sea.
sentences.cn: 在死海边的洞穴里发现了古代的卷轴。

sentences.en: He did a two - foot long ink - and - wash scroll for each of us.
sentences.cn: 他送了我们三个人每人一张 水墨画,两尺琴条.

sentences.en: He took out his sycamore scroll and placed it by the candle.
sentences.cn: 他从口袋里掏出梧桐树皮,放在蜡烛旁边.

sentences.en: He was presented with a scroll commemorating his achievements.
sentences.cn: 他被授予一幅卷轴,以表彰其所做出的成就.

sentences.en: I covered the scroll in sealing wax, and affixed a red ribbon.
sentences.cn: 我用封蜡将卷轴封好，并系上一根红丝带。

sentences.en: One of the most useful innovations in pointing devices is the scroll wheel.
sentences.cn: 点操作设备上最有用的发明之一是滚轮,滚轮有多种,外形略有差异.

sentences.en: Scroll through the document using the slider bar on the right of the window.
sentences.cn: 用窗口右边的滑动条滚动文件.

sentences.en: Scroll to Use Preferred access point and press Select.
sentences.cn: 滚动使用首选接入点和按下选择.

sentences.en: Some programs set this limit too close, resulting in frustratingly temperamental scroll behavior.
sentences.cn: 一些程序将这种限制设置得太窄, 导致滚屏的行为变幻无常,令人沮丧.

sentences.en: The paper windows and hanging scroll remained as still and silent as before.
sentences.cn: 纸窗和幛子依然是那么沉静.

sentences.en: The Tibetan art of scroll painting , or Tangka , is well preserved.
sentences.cn: 藏族卷轴画唐卡艺术得到保护.

sentences.en: They dwelt in a fussy, scroll - work house.
sentences.cn: 他们住在一所装饰过分的雕着云头花纹的房子里.

sentences.en: Tk includes buttons, menus, scroll bars and other graphical widgets.
sentences.cn: Tk包括按纽 、 菜单 、 滚动条和其他的图形小玩意.

sentences.en: Use the arrow keys to scroll through the list of files.
sentences.cn: 用箭头键把文件目录滚动一遍。

sentences.en: Wherever the drop target can possibly be scrolled offscreen, the program needs to auto - scroll.
sentences.cn: 无论拖放的目标对象是否在屏幕之外, 程序都需要自动滚动.

sentences.en: You can scroll through the text using the up and down arrow keys.
sentences.cn: 你可以利用上下箭头键来翻看(计算机屏幕上的)整个文本.

trans.tran_cn: （常用于录写正式文件的）纸卷，书卷，画卷，卷轴，涡卷形（装饰），〈古〉表，目录
trans.tran_en: a long piece of paper that can be rolled up, and is used as an official document

trans.tran_cn: （似卷轴般）卷起，（像展开卷轴般地）将文字显示于屏幕
使成卷形，（电脑屏幕上）从上到下移动（资料等），卷页
